column4: I'm looking to migrate to subversion 1.7, but cannot find any official packages ... why so far behind?
Because we don't upgrade packages unless they are security fixes once an Ubuntu release has been finished.
And I don't see 1.7 even in debian yet or the in-development release of Ubuntu.  You could try looking for a PPA if you really need it though.
Thanks, but it's going to be production, so I'd rather have it stable.... might have to stick to BSD for now then :-(
